file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: "TarkovTracker API"
  description: "Official TarkovTracker API - player's progress, objectives, level, reputation and much more in one place. If you are missing something here, let the developers know on TarkovTracker Discord server or create a new issue on GitHub."
  version: "1.0"
  contact:
    name: "TarkovTracker GitHub"
    url: "https://github.com/TarkovTracker/TarkovTracker"
  license:
    name: "GNU General Public License v3.0"
servers:
  - url: "https://tarkovtracker.io/api/v1"
    description: "TarkovTracker API v1 endpoint"
tags:
  - name: "Progress"
security:
  - bearer: [ ]
paths:
  /token:
    get:
      tags:
        - "Progress"
      summary: ""
      operationId: ""
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Token"
        401:
          description: "Provided API Token is not authorized to access this resource"
  /progress:
    get:
      tags:
        - "Progress"
      summary: ""
      operationId: ""
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Progress"
        401:
          description: "Provided API Token is not authorized to access this resource"
  /team/progress:
    get:
      tags:
        - "Progress"
      summary: ""
      operationId: ""
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/TeamProgress"
        401:
          description: "Provided API Token is not authorized to access this resource"
  /progress/level/{id}:
    post:
      tags:
        - "Progress"
      summary: ""
      operationId: ""
      parameters:
        - name: "id"
          in: "path"
          description: "ID of the quest objective"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: "integer"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Level progress was updated successfully"
        400:
          description: "Provided data on input are invalid"
        401:
          description: "Provided API Token is not authorized to access this resource"
  /progress/quest/{id}:
    post:
      tags:
        - "Progress"
      summary: ""
      operationId: ""
      parameters:
        - name: "id"
          in: "path"
          description: "ID of the quest objective"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: "integer"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Quest progress was updated successfully"
        400:
          description: "Provided data on input are invalid"
        401:
          description: "Provided API Token is not authorized to access this resource"
  /progress/quest/objective/{id}:
    post:
      tags:
        - "Progress"
      summary: ""
      operationId: ""
      parameters:
        - name: "id"
          in: "path"
          description: "ID of the quest objective"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: "integer"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Quest objective progress was updated successfully"
        400:
          description: "Provided data on input are invalid"
        401:
          description: "Provided API Token is not authorized to access this resource"
  /progress/hideout/{id}:
    post:
      tags:
        - "Progress"
      summary: ""
      operationId: ""
      parameters:
        - name: "id"
          in: "path"
          description: "ID of the quest objective"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: "integer"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Hideout progress was updated successfully"
        400:
          description: "Provided data on input are invalid"
        401:
          description: "Provided API Token is not authorized to access this resource"
components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearer:
      bearerFormat: "Bearer <your-tarkovtracker-API-token>"
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
  schemas:
    Token:
      title: "Token"
      description: "User's progress data."
      type: "object"
      properties:
        token:
          type: "string"
          description: "Shows token used to make this call"
        calls:
          type: "integer"
          description: "Shows number of times this token has been used so far"
        permissions:
          type: array
          description: "List of permissions this token has (GP == Read Personal Progression, TP == Read Team Progression, WP == Write Personal Progression)"
          items:
            type: integer
        createdAt:
          type: object
          properties:
            _seconds:
              type: number
              description: "UNIX Timestamp when this authorization token was created"
            _nanoseconds:
              type: number
              description: "Combined with _seconds field, this will give you more precise time of when this authorization token was created"
    TeamProgress:
      title: "TeamProgress"
      description: "Array of team member's progress data."
      type: "array"
      items:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Progress"
    Progress:
      title: "Progress"
      description: "User's progress data."
      type: "object"
      properties:
        level:
          type: "integer"
          description: "Player's current level"
        dataVersion:
          type: "integer"
          description: "Version of player's TarkovTracker client data"
        gameEdition:
          type: "integer"
          description: "Player's game edition (1 = Standard Edition, 2 == Left to Die Edition, 3 == Prepare to Die Edition, 4 == Edge of Darkness Edition)"
        self:
          type: "boolean"
          description: "True if this data belong to token's owner"
        hide:
          type: "boolean"
          description: "???"
        quests:
          type: "array"
          description: "List of completed quests."
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/QuestCompletion"
        hideout:
          type: "array"
          description: "List of installed hideout modules."
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/HideoutModuleCompletion"
        objectives:
          type: "array"
          description: "List of quest objectives."
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/ObjectiveCompletion"
        hideoutObjectives:
          type: "array"
          description: "List of hideout objectives."
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/HideoutModuleObjectiveCompletion"
    QuestCompletion:
      title: "QuestCompletion"
      description: "Player's progress of a given quest."
      type: "object"
      properties:
        complete:
          type: "boolean"
          description: "True if a given quest has been completed"
        timeComplete:
          type: "number"
          description: "UNIX timestamp of the time when quest was marked as complete"
    HideoutModuleCompletion:
      title: "HideoutModuleCompletion"
      description: "Player's progress on a given hideout module."
      type: "object"
      properties:
        complete:
          type: "boolean"
          description: "True if a given hideout module has been installed"
        timeComplete:
          type: "number"
          description: "UNIX timestamp of the time when hideout module was marked as installed"
    ObjectiveCompletion:
      title: "ObjectiveCompletion"
      description: "Player's progress on a given quest objective."
      type: "object"
      properties:
        complete:
          type: "boolean"
          description: "True if a given objective has been completed"
        timeComplete:
          type: "number"
          description: "UNIX timestamp of the time when objective was marked as complete"
    HideoutModuleObjectiveCompletion:
      title: "HideoutModuleObjectiveCompletion"
      description: "Player's progress on a given hideout module objective data."
      type: "object"
      properties:
        complete:
          type: "boolean"
          description: "True if a given hideout module objective has been completed"
        timeComplete:
          type: "number"
          description: "UNIX timestamp of the time when hideout module was marked as complete"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /progress: get: responses: 200: resolve "#/components/schemas/Progress" reference: invalid response reference
